## Core

  1. [environment][] **(always first)**
  1. [editor][] **(before any `keybind`)**
  1. [utility][]
  1. [history][]
  1. [terminal][]
  1. [directory][]
  1. [completion][] **(after `utility`)**
  1. [syntax-highlighting][]
  1. [history-substring-search][] **(after `syntax-highlighting`)**
  1. [git][]
  1. [hub][]
  1. [prompt-pure][] **(usually last)**
